server module¶

Module that runs the server.

server.average(patient_id)¶

GETs average HR over all stored HRs.

Parameters:patient_id – patient id as string
Returns:average HR as JSON
server.heart_rate_get(patient_id)¶

GETs all HRs for patient.

Parameters:patient_id – patient id as string
Returns:list of HRs as JSON
server.heart_rate_post()¶

POSTs patient’s new heart rate with timestamp. Checks for tachycardia and emails physician if tachycardic.

Parameters:
  • patient_id – patient id as string
  • heart_rate – heart rate as integer
Returns:

updated records as JSON
server.interval_average()¶

POSTs timestamp from which average HR calculation should begin.

Parameters:
  • patient_id – patient id as string
  • heart_rate_average_since – timestamp as string
Returns:

average HR over interval as JSON
server.new_patient()¶

POSTs new patient. Expects JSON dictionary with following string keys.

Parameters:
  • patient_id – patient id as string
  • attending_email – attending physician’s email as string
  • user_age – patient’s age in years as integer
Returns:

updated records as JSON
server.status(patient_id)¶

GETs whether patient is tachycardic and returns timestamp using last HR.

Parameters:patient_id – patient id as string
Returns:whether patient is tachycardic and last timestamp

Heart Rate Sentinel Server
